mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE C AS ( SELECT e.account, d.id, d.p_id, d.name, e.name AS member, CONCAT_WS(' > ',d3.name, d2.name, d.name, e.name) AS path FROM dept d INNER JOIN emp e ON d.id = e.dept_id LEFT JOIN dept d2 ON d.p_id = d2.id LEFT JOIN dept d3 ON d2.p_id = d3.id ) SELECT C.path FROM C WHERE C.account = #{account};
